contents.text: Thank you for calling Always Hired in San Francisco, your B2B partner for tech sales talent acquisition.
To speak with our tech sales hiring experts, press 1.
For current tech sales job openings, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our job listings specialist.

navigationGoals: Find and review current tech sales job openings in San Francisco.
Find current tech sales openings that match my military background.
I’d like to pull a feed of your current tech-sales job openings, including skill tags and location filters.
Browse current tech sales openings
Browse current entry-level tech sales positions suitable for a recent physics graduate.

contents.text: To check the status of your application, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to an application support representative.

navigationGoals: Get an update on the status of my submitted tech sales application.
Check the status of my recent tech sales job application.
I need to check the status of my application in your ATS and see if I’ve moved to the next interview stage.
Check how my job application is progressing
Check the status of my application for the tech sales internship I submitted last week.

contents.text: To learn about our employer talent acquisition solutions, press 2.
To discuss enterprise talent acquisition partnerships, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a talent acquisition consultant.

navigationGoals: Discuss setting up an enterprise talent acquisition partnership for my company.
Discuss an enterprise partnership to help place veterans in tech sales roles.
I want to discuss enterprise talent-acquisition integration, especially API and AI-driven candidate sourcing capabilities.
Learn about enterprise hiring partnership services
Explore an enterprise talent acquisition partnership to recruit physics students from my university.

contents.text: For information on pricing and software features, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for pricing details.

navigationGoals: Obtain pricing and feature details for your talent acquisition software.
Get pricing and feature details for your talent-acquisition software for my veteran support organization.
I’m looking for a detailed pricing and feature breakdown for your talent-acquisition platform, including API rate limits and subscription tiers.
Get pricing and feature details for your recruitment software
Request pricing and feature information for your employer platform to support campus hiring events.
